meeting_request.purpose: Help with understanding course material and estimating grades
meeting_request.description: Hi, I'm Randall, a third-year Computer Science major. Last semester was really hard, and I’m still struggling to understand the concepts in my classes. Some of the topics are really complex, and I’m not sure how to apply what I’ve learned to real-world problems. I also have a lot of coursework left, and I’m not sure if I can keep up with the grading schedule. I’m interested in working with a counselor to figure out how to improve my academic performance, but I’m not sure where to start. I’ve been in the computer science program, so I’m familiar with the course content, but I’m still feeling overwhelmed.
